result.execSummary:
The defendant Rocco A Spinelli was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct, a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).
  • Disorderly Conduct, a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: Costs have been paid in full from cash bond previously posted. Pay supervision fees as ordered by Dept. of Corrections.
Obtain AODA assessment and comply with treatment recommendations.

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Defendant Rocco A Spinelli in court with attorney Gregory Allen Gerbers. Defendant Rocco A Spinelli in custody. Raymond Pelrine appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Court reviews charges, max. penalties, elements. Defendant enters no contest pleas to Counts 2, 3. Court questions Defendant on rights, finds pleas made freely and voluntarily, accepts pleas, and finds Defendant guilty of Counts 2, 3. Count 1 is dismissed but read in for sentencing. State/Defense make joint sentencing recommendations. Bond no longer in effect.
Defendant Rocco A Spinelli in court with attorney Brett E Reetz. Defendant Rocco A Spinelli in custody. Joan M. Korb appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Case to track 15-CT-44.

Defendant Rocco A Spinelli in court. Raymond Pelrine appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Court reviews previous activity, questions whether Petition has been completed. Court reviews Petition, questions Defendant on income/expenses, appoints Brett Reetz, orders Defendant to pay $150 per month starting 11/15/15. Defendant appears with attorney Brett E Reetz. Defense will accept appointment, enters not guilty pleas, requests status in 30 days. Bond continues as is.  Status conference scheduled for November 9, 2015 at 10:00 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Rocco A Spinelli
Current: N6418 Oakridge Ct, Shawano, WI 54166 United States  (Effective: 09-14-2015)
Prior: 1547 Egg Harbor Road, Sturgeon Bay, WI 54235
No contact direct or indirect with RP, SB or Nightengale Motel.

Defendant Rocco A Spinelli in court. Joan M. Korb appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Copy of Complaint given to Defendant in Court. Court reviews charges, max. penalties, right to counsel. Defendant can't afford an attorney, had to use the money he was saving for attorney to pay bond so he could keep his job. Discussion regarding why Defendant didn't mention new charges at last court date. Defendant is no longer here in Door County, has to stay in Shawano. Court reviews Petition for Court-appointed Counsel, but it isn't complete. Court advises Defendant that he must make application with PD first.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for September 28, 2015 at 10:00 am.
